attributes.action: Set a legally enforcable ceiling to expenditure on the Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The increasing estimates of the costs of the 2012 games seem to be spiraling out of control and bear no relationship to any longer term benefits that may result. The costs should be set at an affordable figure and held at this even if this means that many events are not held. Idealy, sports should be restricted to field and track events at any future games.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on Olympic funding:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympic
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
